docs.title: GIK Institute of Engineering Sciences and Technology
AI Engineer
docs.text:
SOCO Engineers GmBH Multan, Pakistan

Aug 2024 – Dec 2024

  • Built automation scripts for simulation tools using Python, C++ and bash and achieved results quicker.
  • Implemented Machine Learning Algorithms to processing pipelines, improving test results by 15%.
  • Worked in cross-functional teams for documentation and version control.

docs.title: Trainee Engineer
docs.text:
Faculty of Aerial Research and Integration Systems Rawalpindi/Islamabad, Pakistan

Nov 2023 – July 2024

  • Modelled Systems in MATLAB to create Feedback Systems for flight simulations.
  • Calibrated electronics and sensors, and assembled mechanical frames for outdoor flights.
  • Documented and recorded test results for successful and failed tests.

docs.title: Project 1: Smart Task Manager
docs.text:
Tech Stack: Python, React, Docker

Description: A productivity app that helps users organize tasks, set deadlines, and track progress with AI-powered reminders.

Key Features: - User authentication and profiles - Task scheduling with calendar integration - Dockerized microservices for deployment
